metadata.name: L'Amour 001
metadata.description:
L’AMOUR 001
Phygitals (Physical & Metaverse wearables)

The first tank top of MY BABY TANK TOPS: WEB3 UPCYCLING COLLECTION



The tank top of Love 

Love is about offering, caring, sharing, holding, embracing and surrendering. 
Love is the place where all energies melt and unite. 
Love is how everything comes together and how all that we build can last. 


Love is what Vanille Verloës feels and perceives all around her, and love is what she puts back into her creations. 



Upcycling by Vanille Verloës
CGI in collaboration with Dylan Da Silva


Procedural texturing on simulated cloth
Pulsating heart-shaped fire opal
Embossed Heart pattern like Sugared Almond

Upcycling Baby Dior top from the years 2000
White jersey mixed with a Second Hand Fuchsia Knitting Heart Jumper
Size S (could fit a size M).
